summary: A mod to create a Dothraki race, based on the race of the same name from \"A Song of Fire And Ice\" novels (and Game of Thrones tv show).
descriptionHtml:
*** NOTE: Totally lore un-friendly... Please don\'t bother griping about it. ***

If you use Nexus Mod Manager, download v1.01

--- Description ---
\"Born of fierce horse-tribes, the Dothraki are a force to be reckoned with. They prefer to use weapons over magic and can always summon a horse from the nearest Khalasar if they grow tired of walking.\"

--- Stats ---
Two Handed  |   +10
One Handed  |   +10
Archery        |   +10
Light Armor   |    +5
--------------------------------
                        +35 (same as vanilla races)

Racial Ability : +30 Stamina, +30 Health
     Also, health regen. and stamina regen. have been increased slightly.

Racial Power : \"Summon a horse from a nearby Khalasar\" - Basically, you get a horse (stronger/ faster than vanilla) for 15 minutes.

Additionally,
Males are at a  height of 1.1
Females are at a height of 1.03

--- Notes ---
I\'m pretty new at this, so the mod functions a little strangely. 

Firstly, in the character creation menu, if you switch genders, it will revert to presets from the Nord race. You can fix this by simply toggling presets.

Secondly, there may be other weird glitches that I haven\'t looked at. Try not to summon your horse indoors.

Lastly, if you want a proper 1st person view, I highly recommend using this mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3265 , otherwise, you\'re going to have everybody looking down on your giant Dothraki dude.

--- Recommended Mods --- 
ApachiiSkyHair : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168 
        Has some very nice longer hairs for the Dothraki.

Arakh Blade : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20985
         Haven\'t used it... YET. But it look promising. :D
author: trmadcat
